title: Watch Jim Legxacy’s Video for New Song “Father”

html:
On his new track, the British artist sings, “On the block, I was listening Mitski”

The British rapper, singer, and producer Jim Legxacy has released a new song called “Father.” It follows his XL Recordings debut, “Aggressive,” and comes with a music video directed by Lauzza. Find it below.

Legxacy co-produced “Father” with Cashy, Joe Stanley, and YT. And, at one point on the track, he sings, “On the block, I was listening Mitski.”

Legxacy soon plans to release a new mixtape called Black British Music (2025). He announced the project last year, at the time calling it Black British Music (2024).

Read about Jim Legxacy’s “Old Place” in Pitchfork’s “The 100 Best Songs of 2023.”

Matthew Strauss is a Long Island native and a graduate of Columbia University. He joined Pitchfork in 2013. ... Read more
